sentences.english: To dwell in the cliffs of the valleys, in caves of the earth, and in the rocks.
sentences.chinese: 以致他们住在荒谷之间，在地洞和岩穴中。

sentences.english: There were few or no bridges or tunnels on the route.
sentences.chinese: 在这一段路上几乎可以说没有岩穴，也没有桥梁。

sentences.english: Vugs and fractures are highly vedable in size and in distribution.
sentences.chinese: 岩穴与裂缝在孔的尺寸和孔分布上变化不一。

sentences.english: When the cave door was unlocked, a sorrowful sight presented itself.
sentences.chinese: 岩穴门一打开，就浮现了一幅悲惨的情形。

sentences.english: Fears we've hidden in, like this wretched cave.
sentences.chinese: 我们躲藏于其中的恐惧，一如这令人沮丧的岩穴。

sentences.english: Vugs and fractures are highly variable in size and in distribution.
sentences.chinese: 岩穴与裂缝在孔的尺寸和孔分布上变化不一。

sentences.english: I know you'll come and carry me out into the palace of winds.
sentences.chinese: 我知道你会来这儿，带我走出岩穴，步入风的殿堂。

sentences.english: To dwell in the clifts of the valleys, [in] caves of the earth, and [in] the rocks.
sentences.chinese: 以致他们住在荒谷之间，在地洞和岩穴中。

definition: (of cliffs etc) stand like a wall/rise steeply
woods and ravines/tranquillity of trees and valleys
halfway up a mountain/lit. waist of mountain
